values: Tucker Carlson Reacts to Kamala Harris’s DNC Speech (with Special Guest Jason Whitlock)

While Kamala Harris takes center stage at the DNC, Tucker Carlson and Jason Whitlock are providing unfiltered analysis in real-time. Based on the media’s portrayal of this new nominee, you’d never know that she’s been the 21st century’s least popular vice president and that her own party’s voters rejected her in 2020. You’d think she was a cultural icon. Our coverage is different.
